title: Heima (Sigur Rós) title sequence and credits typeface
content:
I'd be grateful if someone can identify this typeface. It may seem like a common san-serif, but its got some subtle differences, especially with the numbers and '&'. Thank you in advance.

[http://typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-09-13%20at%2000.38.52.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192638/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-09-13%20at%2000.38.52.png "http://typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-09-13%20at%2000.38.52.png")  
 [http://typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-09-13%20at%2000.39.27.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192638/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-09-13%20at%2000.39.27.png "http://typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-09-13%20at%2000.39.27.png")  
 [http://typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-09-13%20at%2000.39.48.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192638/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-09-13%20at%2000.39.48.png "http://typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-09-13%20at%2000.39.48.png")

Font: 

 Engravers Gothic 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192638/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")

author: ipsky84

comments.content:
Seems close: Engravers Gothic. Decided in favor of squared stroke ends based on fuzzy images.  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/bitstream/engravers\_gothic\_bt\_std\_regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192638/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/bitstream/engravers_gothic_bt_std_regular/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192638im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sigur1_4630.jpg)
Many thanks DPape. It seems to be the one.
